# Breaking down the task: 
Stage 1- Unpack the context and business issue 
Stage 2- Formulate questions to structure the inquiry 
Stage 3- Collect investment strategy data and information 
Stage 4- Collect risk management data and information
Stage 5- Develop and present evidence-based conclusions and reasoned arguments in a statement of advice
